Title: Police nab suspected robber, recover stolen motorcycle in Ibadan
Summary: Police nab suspected robber, recover stolen motorcycle in Ibadan . Oyo State Police Command has apprehended a suspected robber and recovered a stolen motorcycle . The arrest was confirmed on Sunday .

Title: Police neutralise robbery suspect, recover firearm in Nasarawa
Summary: Police in Nasarawa State neutralised a suspected armed robber and recovered a firearm during a patrol operation . SP Rahman Nansel, the command’s Police Public Relations Officer, disclosed this in a statement issued to the media .

Title: Woman dies in Anambra road accident
Summary: A lone accident at the Nteje-Onitsha Road, in Ogbunike, Oyi Local Government Area of Anambra, has claimed the life of a woman . The Sector Commander of the Federal Road Safety Corps (FRSC) confirmed the accident .

Title: Police arrest two suspects over alleged kidnapping in Adamawa
Summary: The Police Command in Adamawa says it has arrested two suspects over allegations of kidnapping and threats, executed within the Sarau Belel community, in the Maiha Local Government Area . The command’s spokesman, SP Suleiman Nguroje, disclosed this .

Title: Ivory Coast president seeks parliament majority in election
Summary: Ivory Coast is holding legislative elections on Saturday . Alassane Ouattara won a presidential ballot that extended his 14-year rule . Polling stations in the main city, Abidjan, opened an hour late in torrential rain .

Title: EPL: Arsenal back on top, beat Brighton 2-1
Summary: Arsenal beat Brighton & Hove Albion 2-1 at the Emirates Stadium on Saturday . Martin Ødegaard opened the scoring for Arsenal with a strike from the edge of the box . Georginio Rutter scored an own goal for the Gunners . Diego Gomez pulled a goal back through Diego Gomez for Brighton .

Title: Police recover firearm after suspect flees Enugu event
Summary: The Enugu State Police Command recovered a cut-to-size single-barrelled gun from a fleeing male suspect . The firearm was recovered by police operatives attached to the Igbo-Eze South Police Division on December 26 . The state Commissioner of Police, Mr Mamman Giwa, has urged residents to remain law-abiding

Title: Global cooperation, not isolation, key to Nigeria’s security – Jimoh Ibrahim
Summary: Senator representing Ondo South, Jimoh Ibrahim, has stated that no nation in the contemporary international system enjoys absolute sovereignty . This is as he insisted that global security realities compel states to embrace cooperation and collective action . Title: COAS hails soldiers' courage, sacrifice
Summary: The Chief of Army Staff, Lt. Gen. Waidi Shaibu, has commended “the courage, discipline and sacrifice” of Nigerian Army officers and personnel serving across the nation . He made the remarks during a Christmas lunch with troops under the 63 Brigade Nigerian Army at the 3 Battalion Barracks, Effurun,

Title: VIDEO: Tinubu arrives Eyo festival venue in Lagos
Summary: President Bola Tinubu made a colourful appearance at the Tafawa Balewa Square, Lagos on Saturday to join residents and tourists for the celebration of the ongoing Eyo Festival .
